title: Python vs Java Language Popularity
description: Interactive line chart comparing the popularity of Python and Java from 2010-2025, showing how Python overtook Java as the dominant language in computer science education
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: programming languages
Python
Java
CS education trends
TIOBE index
learningObjectives: Understand the shift in programming language popularity from Java to Python over the past 15 years
Identify the approximate year when Python overtook Java in popularity
Explain why Python has become the dominant first language in CS education
